content: back bay boomerang pattern info instructions gauge not critical cast-on 5 stitches yarn shown in wonderland yarns blossoms a row 1 sl1 k2tog knit until 2 fingering-weight gradient but you can use any stitches before end k f/b/f k1 weight yarn you like row 2 sl1 knit to end needles for our fingering-weight sample we repeat row 1-2 until you run out used a us 4 24 circ for other weight yarns see recommended needle size on label of yarn or desired length bind-off abbreviations k = knit sl1 = slip 1 stitch with yarn held in back k2tog = knit the next 2 stitches together k f/b/f = knit into the front of the next stitch but before taking it off of the needle knit into the back of this same stitch and then again into the front of the same stitch 2 stitches increased
